jd: From: Rohit Kumar Bid, Vyze Inc rbid@vyzeinc.com Reply to: rbid@vyzeinc.com net Architect* 1 open role* 3 month contract, probable extension and potential conversion* client is located in San Ramon, CA* role is onsite 5 days/week* only submit candidates already living in the area* solid communication skills is a must for this roleVisa: CITIZEN,GREEN CARD,GC EAD,H4 EADJob Description:We are seeking a .NET Architect with experience in building UI-based applications (React/Angular), Winforms/WCF on Azure Cloud. This is a contract role with potential conversion to full-time employment. The successful candidate will already live in the San Ramon, CA area and be able to go onsite 5 days/week. You must have AWM (Asset Wealth Management)/Financial Services experience.Skills:Must have played a role of Sr. ArchitectMust have a solid communication to collaboratively drive buildingTarget Architecture of the applicationTech Leadership across Client TeamsBuild a tech roadmap for the productProvide Tech Leadership to the implementation team for migration of D&C’s on-prem EWS application to cloudAWM experience requiredSkills | Must-Haves:* 8+ years of professional experience* experience in building UI-based applications (React/Angular), Winforms/WCF on Azure Cloud* AWM (Asset Wealth Management)/Financial Services experience* strong communication skillsNice to Have Skills:* Azure certifications* Bachelor's Degree or higher
